metadata.title: SAP Incident Response- lock User from Teams- Basic
metadata.description: This Playbook Provides the automation for the SAP incidents. It allows for automatically pop a Teams message or an email to the user to notify them of the incident. It also allows for the user to be blocked on AD or SAP, for the incident to be closed.
prerequisites: 1. Update your SAP alert rules to the latest version.
2. Asign the releavnt Teams or email addresses to be used as responders.
3. Optional- set you SAP system to allow user locking from Sentinel, See more details at https://aka.ms/sentinel4sapintro.
postDeployment: 1. Once deployment is complete, you will need to authorize each connection.
2. Navigate to playbook --> API Connections --> Select connections one by one --> Edit API Connection --> (if required) Enter API key or credentials --> Save
